name: Dittofeed
headline: Open-source customer engagement & messaging automation
description:
Dittofeed is an open-source alternative to platforms like Klaviyo and Customer.io. Self-host us for free, or use our low-cost cloud offering to automate messages across email, SMS, mobile push, WhatsApp, and more. 

We also offer solutions for embedding Dittofeed in your own SaaS! Instantly provide your customers with automated messaging tools.

founders.name: Chandler Craig, Founder
founders.description: Startup marketer, music marketer, full-stack engineer, and open-source proponent. Cofounder of Dittofeed, making the marketing software experience better for growth engineers and marketing ops.

founders.name: Maxwell Gurewitz, Founder
founders.description: Max led major engineering initiatives at Braze, a leading marketing automation company.

## Messaging Automation for All
Omni-channel marketing & transactional automation. Embeddable, self-hostable, & infinitely flexible.
[Get Started](http://dittofeed.com/<https:/app.dittofeed.com/dashboard>)[Book a Demo](http://dittofeed.com/<https:/calendly.com/d/zy7-8d5-jdq/dittofeed-demo-founders>)

## Built for developer efficiency
![Small grey and orange icon representing authentication and authorization](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664393f5bd2b0c6d4fdf5437/6644bdb658bc3d49571f90fc_Auth.svg)
Authentication + Authorization
Choose between anonymous, single-tenant, or multi-tenant auth modes to suit your specific needs.
[Check out auth modes](http://dittofeed.com/<https:/docs.dittofeed.com/deployment/self-hosted/auth-modes>)
![Small grey and orange gear icon representing the Dittofeed API](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664393f5bd2b0c6d4fdf5437/6644bdb703d2c425e4b11164_API.svg)
APIs
Dittofeed provides a REST API for connecting/configuring app data & an Admin API for programmatically managing your workspace. 
[API Reference](http://dittofeed.com/<https:/docs.dittofeed.com/api-reference/endpoints/apps/identify>)
![Small grey and orange stacked square icon representing Dittofeed's SDKs](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664393f5bd2b0c6d4fdf5437/6644bdb852326481cbf004de_SDK.svg)
SDKs
Connect to our APIs via several SDKs, including Web, Node.js, & React Native. If there's an SDK that we're missing and you need, create a GitHub issue & we'll build it for you.
[Choose an SDK](http://dittofeed.com/<https:/docs.dittofeed.com/integrations/sdks>)
![Small grey and orange stacked boxes icon representing Dittofeed's infrastructure](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664393f5bd2b0c6d4fdf5437/66577a10163d2061fd9260d3_infrastructure_icon.svg)
Infrastructure
A future-proofed TypeScript app built on top of the fastest infrastructure available: Postgres, ClickHouse, & Temporal. Plus, a segmentation engine that can process massive volumes of streamed user events.
[Architecture diagram](http://dittofeed.com/<https:/docs.dittofeed.com/contributing/architecture>)
Self-hosting
Control customer data
Self-host Dittofeed to keep full control of your data. Avoid worrying about 3rd party compliance & vendor lock-in.
[Deploy to Render](http://dittofeed.com/<https:/render.com/deploy?repo=https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed>)[Read docs](http://dittofeed.com/<https:/docs.dittofeed.com/deployment/self-hosted>)

## Modernizing through flexibility
Platforms like MailChimp & Iterable are outdated & expensive. Dittofeed is a flexible alternative that innovates & improves without pricing you out.
![An orange dollar symbol representing pricing security](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664393f5bd2b0c6d4fdf5437/6647cf000c43a21f76ad9713_pricing_icon.svg)
Pricing Security
Dittofeed solves the issue of vendor lock-in by providing an escape hatch for our Cloud users. If at any time you would like to switch to self-hosting Dittofeed, we offer technical support to help with the transition.
[View pricing](http://dittofeed.com/</pricing>)
![An orange circle representing responsive customer support](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664393f5bd2b0c6d4fdf5437/6644bdb9f9dd7bcd40a618f9_placeholder.svg)
Responsive Support
Get in touch with a human instantly to resolve issues over a dedicated Slack Connect (organizations only), the Dittofeed Discord community, or email at support@dittofeed.com.
[Join Discord](http://dittofeed.com/<https:/discord.gg/HajPkCG4Mm>)
![An orange and grey version control icon representing extensibility](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664393f5bd2b0c6d4fdf5437/665781ac4aec8f92316dba0e_version-control_icon%202.svg)
Extensibility
We love working with our users to add the features they need. Because our code is open source, everyone benefits when we improve the product.
[Open a ticket](http://dittofeed.com/<https:/github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/issues>)
![An orange and grey stacked square icon representing embeddable and white-labeled components](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664393f5bd2b0c6d4fdf5437/6647b316dd59f6e40021e540_embed_icon.svg)
Embedded Components & White-labeling
Add your branding to our products and dashboards. Embed our tools within your own SaaS offering. Dittofeed is the only open-source customer engagement platform to offer programmatic control of multiple workspaces with complete data isolation between each workspace.
Comming soon
[Get early access](http://dittofeed.com/<#>)[How it works](http://dittofeed.com/<https:/www.dittofeed.com/embedded-components>)
### Curious about new & upcoming features?
Check out our changelog to stay informed about recent feature releases & bug fixes.
[View Changelog](http://dittofeed.com/</changelog>)

![Y Combinator logo. Dittofeed is a YC funded company.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664393f5bd2b0c6d4fdf5437/6644bdae5974b89d6541bb3d_yc-logo-expanded-orange.7846e3a7.svg.svg)
## FAQs
How do I self-host Dittofeed?
Simply [deploy to Render](http://dittofeed.com/<https:/render.com/deploy?repo=https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed>) and follow the prompts to deploy Dittofeed. Alternatively, check our [Self-Hosting Dittofeed docs](http://dittofeed.com/<https:/docs.dittofeed.com/deployment/self-hosted>) for more self-hosting options & instructions.
Is Dittofeed a low-code application?
Yes, Dittofeed is a low-code application. Engineering work is typically required to submit data to Dittofeed, after which little to no engineering involvement is required.
Who is Dittofeed for?
Dittofeed is for organizations that need to automatically trigger messages to their users. Weâ€™ve architected the platform for scalability, and the UI is simple enough for non-technical team members.
Whatâ€™s the difference between cloud and self-hosting?
With Dittofeed cloud we take care of hosting for you, and provide more advanced auth out of the box.
What kind of messages can I send with Dittofeed?
Messaging channels include email, sms, and webhooks, with more under active development. Send any form of lifecycle marketing or transactional message, such as product updates, password change alerts, newsletters, onboarding reminders, cart reminders, invoices/receipts, etc.
How do I contribute to the open-source repository?
To get involved in our development process, visit our [documentation](http://dittofeed.com/<https:/docs.dittofeed.com/contributing>) on contributing and [view open issues](http://dittofeed.com/<https:/github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/issues>).
How much does Dittofeed cost?
Self-hosting is free! Our cloud offering starts at $75/month. However, pricing is dependent on your organizationâ€™s unique active user count and the number of events we will be processing on your behalf. Contact support@dittofeed.com for a quote.
Is there a free trial available?
Yes, all new cloud accounts receive a free 14-day trial.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Dittofeed**

Dittofeed is an innovative startup aiming to revolutionize customer engagement and messaging automation. Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S22, Dittofeed positions itself as an open-source alternative to established platforms like Klaviyo and Customer.io. Located in Los Angeles, CA, Dittofeed runs with a lean team of just two employees.

**Mission & Offerings**

The company's mission revolves around providing flexible, open-source solutions for messaging and engagement. Users can choose to self-host Dittofeed for free or opt for their low-cost cloud offering. Dittofeed facilitates automated messaging across various channels, including email, SMS, mobile push notifications, and WhatsApp. What's compelling here is the versatilityâ€”businesses can directly integrate Dittofeed into their own SaaS products, enabling them to offer automated messaging tools instantly.

**Products & Features**

- **Embedded Components:** Seamlessly integrate Dittofeed functionalities within your SaaS application.
- **Journeys:** A drag-and-drop GUI for creating messaging automation flows.
- **Segments:** Robust segmentation capabilities with a low-code interface, enabling tailored communications.
- **Templates:** A user-friendly template editor that supports easy personalization and subscription management.
- **Channels:** Comprehensive omni-channel support to ensure messages reach users wherever they are.

**Developer-friendly Tools**

Dittofeed's focus on developers is evident with their well-documented APIs, SDKs, and an active GitHub repository, ensuring that users have the tools and support they need to deploy and manage Dittofeed seamlessly.

**Cost Structure**

Perhaps one of Dittofeed's most attractive features is its pricing model. Self-hosting is free, making it accessible for startups and smaller businesses wary of vendor lock-in. For those who prefer the cloud service, it begins at an affordable $75/month, with pricing correlating to unique user counts and event processing needs. New users can also take advantage of a free 14-day trial to explore the platform without upfront commitment.

**Community & Support**

Dittofeed boasts an active community on Discord, offering quick support and collaboration opportunities for users. The platform is aimed at both technical and non-technical users, thereby broadening its appeal.

**Conclusion**

In summary, Dittofeed is carving out a niche in the customer engagement space by prioritizing flexibility, developer efficiency, and community. With its open-source foundation and various automation tools, Dittofeed stands out as a cost-effective alternative for businesses seeking to elevate their messaging strategies without being bound to traditional, costly platforms. Interested parties can explore more at [dittofeed.com](http://dittofeed.com).
